name: Gunslinger Mutants
description:
In the Wild West, a town called Liberty exists. There's lots of hustle and bustle, with
busy saloons and busy shops. However, the town is especially known for its cattle
trade. Unfortunately, over the past few months, the residents of Liberty have seen a few
strange things in the town. One of the things being the disappearance of their famous
cattle.
Theories have been bounded around for centuries that aliens use their UFO's to suck
cows up for the inners and then release them back down. There have been murmurs
going around the town suggesting that there has been an alien invasion and something
must be done to save their precious cattle.
In steps the local cowboy, and hero Quickfinger Clyde! The local residents have tasked
him with the job of saving both the cattle and the reputation of the town. Easy job?
You'd think so but there's aliens standing in the way...
